update oa_part_time
part_qq = #{partQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
submit_state = #{submitState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
part_phone = #{partPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update oa_part_time set part_qq = #{partQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_state = #{submitState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_phone = #{partPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_alipay = #{partAlipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_money = #{partMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deduct = #{deduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settle_date = #{settleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, part_remark = #{partRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_audit = #{partAudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_settle_state = #{partSettleState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_remark = #{financeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_name = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_service_name = #{sendServiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_money_real = #{partMoneyReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, part_money_finance = #{partMoneyFinance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_audit_finance = #{partAuditFinance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_settle_state_finance = #{partSettleStateFinance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_finance_remark = #{partFinanceRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_user_remark = #{partUserRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select ,o.delivery_date from oa_part_time p left join oa_order o on p.order_number = o.order_number
(p.service_name LIKE '%${keyWord}%' OR p.order_number LIKE '%${keyWord}%')
and p.part_audit_finance = #{partAuditFinance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and p.part_settle_state_finance = #{partSettleStateFinance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and p.part_money != null
and p.part_money == null
AND `settle_date` >= DATE_FORMAT(#{settleDate},'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND `settle_date` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{settleDate},'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
order by create_time desc
mapper.update:
update oa_part_time
part_audit_finance = #{audit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
part_settle_state_finance = #{settle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id in
#{item}
